snippet: When Kyle Flood left his job teaching high school math in the 1990s to give coaching football a shot, some of his old job habits stayed with him.
abstract: Profile of Rutgers football coach Kyle Flood, who is busy preparing the team for its home opener against Howard; Flood, a former high school math teacher, says he was surprised to find that coaching fit in naturally with his calculative background.
lead_paragraph: When Kyle Flood left his job teaching high school math in the 1990s to give coaching football a shot, some of his old job habits stayed with him.

headline.seo: Kyle Flood Is Now the Rutgers Coach, but Still a Teacher
headline.main: Now the Rutgers Coach, but Still a Teacher
headline.print_headline: Now the Rutgers Coach, but Still a Teacher
